column2: Laureate Education, Inc. operates a portfolio of degree-granting higher education institutions primarily focused in Latin America. The institutions in its Laureate International Universities network offers a range of undergraduate and graduate degrees through campus-based, online and hybrid programs. Its segments include Brazil, Mexico, Andean, Rest of World and Online & Partnerships. It owns approximately 12 institutions in seven states throughout Brazil. It owns approximately two institutions in Mexico. The Andean segment includes institutions in Chile and Peru. The Rest of World segment includes campus-based institutions in Asia Pacific with operations in Australia, Malaysia and New Zealand. The Online & Partnerships segment includes online institutions that offer profession-oriented degree programs in the United States through Walden University and through the University of Liverpool and the University of Roehampton in the United Kingdom.
